channel.title: Mvp on Damian Galarza | Technical Partner for Startups & Fractional CTO
channel.description: Recent content in Mvp on Damian Galarza | Technical Partner for Startups & Fractional CTO

item.title: Startup Software in a Regulated World — Without Slowing Down
item.description: We built the internal platform that powered Join Parachute’s first plasma collection center and scaled it to 26+ FDA-licensed sites. This post shares how we delivered under tight timelines, aligned with regulatory requirements, and laid the groundwork for our first FDA-cleared SaMD — all while maintaining startup speed.
